item.title: CVE-2023-0481|2023-02-24T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- quarkus
item.description: In RestEasy Reactive implementation of Quarkus the insecure File.createTempFile() is used in the FileBodyHandler class which creates temp files with insecure permissions that could be read by a local user.
